title: The Stoner Man S01E04 - Trip Down Memory Lane
description:
PERSONAL RECOMENDATION: If you havnt seen the show before go watch this first: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4348911/The_Stoner_Man_-_Season_1_Intro 



The Stoner Man is a internet show which first aired 14/8/08. Mostly shot from webcam, it is about a stoner called Rob, aka The Stoner Man. Rob does nothing but get wasted and does a wide range of things for your entertainment & education while smoking weed/pot/bud/whatever you call it. Episodes that have been recorded so far include topics of weird things to make bongs out of, conservitive ways to smoke & handy tips... but most of the episodes Ive seen are of Rob just being a dumbass stoned cunt for you to laugh at.

I Highly recomend you get stoned first before watching this show videos, just makes them all the more funnier. I know the stoner man personally & have permission to upload his videos here before they are released on youtube (apart from the first few episodes which are already out) so nothing illegal about this torrent except the fact its about drugs. lol



The Stoner Man Youtube Channel: Cant be displayed on TPB, See below

I Also Have The Stoner Man's Personal Bebo Page: http://www.bebo.com/Profile.jsp?MemberId=4115879995 - Feel free to drop him a comment or ask for the shows youtube channel URL.

The Stoner Man Show Official Myspace: Shutdown

The Stoner Man Show Official Bebo: Shutdown
